divs: Sighting DetailsI was at the bus stop in the morning. Nobody was around and nobody was awake. I looked over at the trees and there was a red light. I thought it was a plane until it emerged. It floated straight upwards and all of a sudden I couldn't move. I got really shakey and i just stared at it in awe. It moved really weird. Really fast left to right and up and down. And it was rotating at the same time. I watched it as it passed and then it just disapeared, maybe it just started going really really fast so I couldn't see. But I know it was NOT a plane. I felt like i was going to throw up after it happened for a long time. It was very close to my house so now i am worried. But I hope to see it again.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Baldwinsville
There were no other sightings in Baldwinsville on or around January 18th 2008
